verses.1: Topa aw, nang kong sam hi; hong kinawh in. Nang kong sap ciangin ka aw hong ngai in.
verses.2: Ka thungetna pen na mai ah paknamtui bangsak inla, ka khutte ka lap tohna pen nitak biakpiakna bangsak in.
verses.3: Topa aw, keima kam a cing ding khat koih inla, ka mukteʼ kongkhak a vil ding khat koih in.
verses.4: Mawh bawlnopna lungsim hong neisak kei inla, a gilo mite tawh hong kikhawlsak kei in. Amauʼ anlimte hong duhgawhsak kei ta in.
verses.5: Mipha pa kei hong vuasak inla, ahih hangin migilote ka lu sathau nilhsak kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh amauʼ gitloh gamtatnate nakpi takin langpangin thu ka ngenngen hi.
verses.6: Amaute, thu kisitin mawhsakna a thuak uh ciangin, Topaʼ thute man hi, ci-in a thei ding uh hi.
verses.7: Mi khat in suangpi khat sukhamin leitungah a thehthang gawp bangin Leinuaiʼ kongvang ah amauʼ guhte kithehthang hi.
verses.8: Ahih hangin Topa Pasian aw, nang kong muang tawntung a, nangmah kong bel hi. Tua ahih manin kei hong nusia kei in.
verses.9: Amaute in kei hong siahna uh tehlop le siatna bawlteʼ thangzak panin kei hong kem in.
verses.10: Kei ka suahtak khit ciangin amauʼ ngenthang sung mahah migilote awksak in.
